trans-unit.source: "Magic is my thread, my will the needle. I weave over you as if you never were."\n—Poetics of Hanan
trans-unit.target: 「魔法为我针，意志是我线。 我将织过你，如你不曾在。」 ～哈娜的短篇

trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME comes into play, return three basic lands you control to owner's hand or bury CARDNAME.\noc\nT, Return CARDNAME to owner's hand: Bury target creature and put a Sheep token into play under the control of the creature's controller. Treat this token as a 0/1 green creature.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进场时，将三张你所操控的基本地移回其拥有者手上，否则埋葬CARDNAME。 ocT，将CARDNAME移回其拥有者手上：埋葬目标生物，并且放置一绵羊衍生物在该生物之操控者的操控下进场。将此衍生物视为0/1之绿色生物。

trans-unit.target: 「和贫穷比起来，有钱实在是件好事～你吃的比较好，你穿得比较暖，而你的伙伴也较常洗澡。」 ～库坎沙海盗奇普坎伯

Flying

trans-unit.target: 飞行 当CARDNAME进场时，将一只你所操控的生物收回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.target: 「凯雷威克相信龙兽们的鸣叫是在预言他的胜利；然而事实上，他们是在为他即将面临的死亡哀悼。」 ～泰菲力

trans-unit.source: Teferi's Realm
trans-unit.target: 泰菲力的领地

trans-unit.source: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player chooses artifacts, creatures, lands, or global enchantments. All cards of that type phase out.
trans-unit.target: 在每一位玩家的回合开始时，该玩家选择神器、生物或广域性结界其中一项。所有该类别的牌跃离。

trans-unit.source: "Fire is dead. Water has killed him."\n—From *The Stories of Nature*
trans-unit.target: 「火死了。是水杀了它」 ～引自「大自然的故事」

trans-unit.source: Three Wishes

trans-unit.source: Take the top three cards from your library, look at them, and set them aside face down. You may play those cards as though they were in your hand. At the beginning of your next turn, bury any of those cards not played.
trans-unit.target: 取出你的牌库顶上的三张牌：检视它们以后，将它们面朝下的放在一旁。你可将这些牌视同放在你手上的牌并使用它们。在你的下回合开始时，埋葬它们之中所有未被使用的牌。

trans-unit.resname: VIS·46 | Time and Tide | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 光阴似箭

trans-unit.target: 所有已跃离之生物跃回，且所有具时间跳跃异能之生物跃离。

trans-unit.resname: VIS·46 | Time and Tide | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Time may heal all wounds, but what heals time?"\n—Teferi
trans-unit.target: 「时间或许能治愈一切伤痛，但可有任何东西能治愈时间？」 ～泰菲力

trans-unit.target: 「对于我过去的作为我常感后悔，但我没从想过这些事会因我而被抹消。」 ～费米瑞甫哲学家奈玛

trans-unit.source: "Careless, like a child with fire, so was I with time."\n—Teferi
trans-unit.target: 「太轻率了！我就如同小孩玩火般的在玩弄时间。」 ～泰菲力

trans-unit.source: "Fly us higher, out of its storm."\n—Sisay, Captain of the *Weatherlight*
trans-unit.target: 「让我们飞高点，以脱离他的风暴。」 ～晴空号船长西赛

trans-unit.target: 「你的自大令我惊讶，凯雷威克。你难道不知道你要付出的代价吗？」 ～曼格拉

trans-unit.resname: VIS·52 | Blanket of Night | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Kaervek imprisoned Mangara out of jealousy, but he taints Jamuraa simply out of spite."\n—Asmira, Holy Avenger
trans-unit.target: 「基于嫉妒，凯雷威克囚禁曼格拉；但他对杰姆拉的破坏，只是纯粹基于坏心眼罢了。」 ～神圣复仇者阿玆蜜拉

trans-unit.target: 蟑螂窝

trans-unit.resname: VIS·53 | Brood of Cockroaches | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "It's like waking on a bed of a thousand olives during an earthquake of subtle force."\n—Afari, *Tales*
trans-unit.target: 「那就有如从微弱地震里，由满是橄榄的床上醒来一般。」 ～雅法莉，故事集

trans-unit.target: 和犀牛打交道 ～费米瑞甫俚语，意指「别无选择」

trans-unit.source: "Once I dreamt of death, but now it dreams of me / And only rats and rotting flesh can hear my silent plea."\n—Mundungu chant
trans-unit.target: 「我曾梦见死亡，如今却是死亡梦想著我／只剩老鼠和腐肉倾听我无声的祈求」 ～穆敦古圣诗

trans-unit.target: 目标生物得+1/+1。 牺牲一只生物：重生受此结界的生物。

trans-unit.source: "As you breathe your last, understand why I accept such forbidden gifts."\n—Purraj of Urborg
trans-unit.target: 「当你咽下最后一口气时，试著了解我为何要接受这禁忌的赐与吧！」 ～乌尔博格之普芮

trans-unit.target: 死之监视

trans-unit.target: 如果受此结界的生物被放置入任何坟墓场，则此生物的操控者失去与此生物力量相等的生命，并且你得到与牠防御力相等的生命。

trans-unit.source: "Watch death wait / Wait, death, watch / Steal breath swiftly / but steal life slowly."\n—Suq'Ata dirge
trans-unit.target: 「看那死亡等待／等吧！死亡，看著／快快的窃取气息／但慢慢窃取生命」 ～舒垮塔悼歌

trans-unit.source: Desolation
trans-unit.target: 荒芜

trans-unit.source: At the end of each turn, each player who tapped a land for mana during that turn sacrifices a land. If a plains is sacrificed in this way, CARDNAME deals 2 damage to that plains' controller.
trans-unit.target: 在每回合结束时，任何玩家若在该回合中横置地产生魔法力时，每横置一张则须牺牲一张地。如果因此被牺牲的是平原，则CARDNAME对该平原的操控者造成2点伤害。

trans-unit.source: "Kill a creature, destroy the present. Kill the land, destroy the future."\n—Kaervek
trans-unit.target: 「杀死生物，毁了现在杀死土地，毁了未来」 ～凯雷威克

trans-unit.target: 侧面攻击（若不具侧面攻击异能之生物阻挡此生物，则该阻挡生物得-1/-1直到回合结束。） CARDNAME不能进行阻挡。

trans-unit.source: In troubled times, there are few greater sorrows than a wayward savior.
trans-unit.target: 在骚乱的时代中，很少有比一个任性的救世主更令人伤感的事。

trans-unit.source: Forbidden Ritual
trans-unit.target: 禁忌祭礼

trans-unit.target: 牺牲一张场上的牌：目标对手失去2点生命，除非他或她牺牲一张永久性或选择弃掉一张牌。你可以重复此过程任意数次。

trans-unit.target: 选择一项～目标玩家选择弃掉一张牌；或者目标生物得+2/-1直到回合结束；或者目标生物获得沼泽行者异能直到回合结束（如果防御玩家操控任何沼泽，则该生物无法被阻挡）。

trans-unit.target: 移回你操控的X张沼泽至拥有者手上：CARDNAME造成X点伤害，你可以将这些伤害分配到任意数量的目标生物上。

trans-unit.source: "I offered you eternal life; I just didn't say *where*."\n—Shauku, Endbringer
trans-unit.target: 「我是赐与你永生了，只不过我没说在哪儿。」 ～屠戮者刹酷

trans-unit.source: Kaervek's Spite
trans-unit.target: 凯雷威克之怨

trans-unit.source: Sacrifice all permanents, Discard your hand: Target player loses 5 life.
trans-unit.target: 牺牲所有永久性，弃掉你所有手牌：目标玩家失去5点生命。

trans-unit.source: "The end justifies the means. What do I care if I rule over the dead rather than over the living? The dead ask fewer questions."\n—Kaervek
trans-unit.target: 「结果可使手段正当化。要让我选择的话，我宁可君临死者而非生者。那有什么好在意的？死者的问题少得多了。」 ～凯雷威克

trans-unit.source: Necromancy
trans-unit.target: 死灵术

trans-unit.source: You may choose to play CARDNAME as an instant; if you do, bury it at end of turn.\nWhen you play CARDNAME, choose target creature card in any graveyard. When CARDNAME comes into play, put that creature into play as though it were just played and CARDNAME becomes a creature enchantment that targets the creature. If CARDNAME leaves play, bury the creature.
trans-unit.target: 你可将CARDNAME视为瞬间使用。若你如此做，则在回合结束时埋葬CARDNAME。 当你施放CARDNAME时，选择坟墓场中的目标生物牌。当CARDNAME进场时，放置该生物进场，并将其视为刚进场。此时，CARDNAME成为生物结界，其目标为该生物。若CARDNAME离场，埋葬该生物。

trans-unit.source: Necrosavant
trans-unit.target: 死灵学者

trans-unit.target: o3oBoB，牺牲一只生物：放置CARDNAME进场。此异能只能在你的维持阶段且CARDNAME在你的坟墓场中时使用。

trans-unit.source: "Ah, I remember my first death."\n—Zarkuu, necrosavant
trans-unit.target: 「啊！我还记得第一次死去时。」 ～死灵学者札骷

trans-unit.source: Nekrataal
trans-unit.target: 尼可拉塔

trans-unit.source: First strike\nWhen CARDNAME comes into play, bury target nonartifact, nonblack creature.
trans-unit.target: 先攻 当CARDNAME进场时，埋葬目标非神器且非黑色的生物。

trans-unit.source: "I have seen the horrors Kaervek has freed. My betrayal is certain—but of Kaervek or of Jamuraa, I cannot say."\n—Jolrael
trans-unit.target: 「我眼看著凯雷威克的怪兽们获得自由。我的确是背叛了，但被背叛的是凯雷威克或是杰姆拉？我不敢肯定。」 ～裘蕾尔

trans-unit.resname: VIS·67 | Pillar Tombs of Aku | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Pillar Tombs of Aku

trans-unit.source: During each player's upkeep, that player sacrifices a creature, or that player loses 5 life and you bury CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 在每位玩家的维持阶段中，该玩家牺牲一生物；或是该玩家失去5点生命，并且你埋葬CARDNAME。

trans-unit.resname: VIS·67 | Pillar Tombs of Aku | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Aku, City of Hidden Graves / Aku, City of Lost Kings / Aku, welcome me."\n—Pillar tomb inscription
trans-unit.target: 「尔库，隐藏诸墓之都／尔库，失落诸皇之都／尔库，欢迎我吧。」 ～节录自碑文

trans-unit.source: Python
trans-unit.target: 巨蟒

trans-unit.source: "How can you claim the gods are merciless when they robbed the snake of its limbs to give the other creatures a sporting chance?"\n—Hakim, Loreweaver
trans-unit.target: 「你怎能说诸神是毫无慈悲的？他们夺去了蛇的双脚，以给予其他生物公平的机会。」 ～说书人哈金

trans-unit.source: Suq'Ata Assassin
trans-unit.target: 舒夸塔刺客

trans-unit.resname: VIS·69 | Suq'Ata Assassin | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME cannot be blocked except by artifact or black creatures.\nIf CARDNAME attacks and is not blocked, defending player gets a poison counter. If any player has ten or more poison counters, he or she loses the game.
trans-unit.target: 神器或黑色以外的生物皆不可阻挡CARDNAME。 若CARDNAME攻击且未被阻挡，则防御玩家得一中毒指示物。若任何玩家得十个或更多中毒指示物，则输掉此盘游戏。

trans-unit.resname: VIS·70 | Tar Pit Warrior | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Tar Pit Warrior
trans-unit.target: 焦油坑战士

trans-unit.resname: VIS·70 | Tar Pit Warrior | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: If CARDNAME is the target of a spell or effect, bury CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 若CARDNAME成为咒语或效应的目标，则埋葬CARDNAME。

trans-unit.resname: VIS·70 | Tar Pit Warrior | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The cyclops shrugged off savage blows, but casual insults made him weep."\n—Azeworai, "The Cyclops who Couldn't"
trans-unit.target: 「那只独眼巨人从不惧怕野蛮的攻击，但一个漫不经心的羞辱便会让他哭泣。」 ～阿札渥雷，「脆弱的独眼巨人」

trans-unit.source: Urborg Mindsucker
trans-unit.target: 乌尔博格吮灵妖

trans-unit.resname: VIS·71 | Urborg Mindsucker | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: o\nB, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Target opponent discards a card at random. Play this ability as a sorcery.
trans-unit.target: oB，牺牲CARDNAME：目标对手随机弃一张牌。将此异能视为巫术使用。

trans-unit.source: "My pet will pick the ripe fruit from your tortured brain as if it were hanging from a vine."\n—Kaervek
trans-unit.target: 「我的宠物会从你满受折磨的脑袋中，像由藤蔓上般地采下成熟的果实。」 ～凯雷威克

trans-unit.source: Vampiric Tutor
trans-unit.target: 吸血鬼导师

trans-unit.resname: VIS·72 | Vampiric Tutor | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Pay 2 life: Search your library for any one card. Shuffle your library, then put that card on top of your library.

trans-unit.source: Phyrexian Walker
trans-unit.target: 非瑞克西亚步行机

trans-unit.source: "I have heard terrible tales of black rains, ashen fields, and metal that screams. I have consoled myself that the tales were a myth of some fevered mind. But today I saw a walker—and now I fear the truth."\n—Kasib Ibn Naji, Letters
trans-unit.target: 「我曾听过有关黑色的雨、灰白的田野、尖叫的金属等可怕的故事。我曾安慰自己那只是疯人们的神话。但今天我看到了一台步行机，我开始害怕那些全是事实。」 ～卡西普‧伊本‧那杰，书信集

trans-unit.resname: VIS·153 | Sands of Time | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Sands of Time
trans-unit.target: 时间砂

trans-unit.resname: VIS·153 | Sands of Time | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Each player skips his or her untap phase.\nAt the beginning of each player's turn, untap each tapped artifact, creature, and land he or she controls and tap each untapped artifact, creature, and land he or she controls.
trans-unit.target: 每名玩家略过其重置阶段。 在每名玩家之回合开始时，重置其操控的所有已横置之神器、生物及地，并横置其操控的所有未横置之神器、生物及地。
